The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 October is 839,580 (1,491.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 25 October, there were 128,730 new confirmed cases (228.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 October, there were 101,980 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 26% ( 26,750 extra cases).
